participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and spirited, Maya thrives on the thrill of racing and loves the freedom her motorbike brings. She's friendly and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and laid-back, Jake is eager to explore life beyond his parents' home and enjoys spending time with friends. He has a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out my parents home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i've a part time job at burger king.
